function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate use of air cleaners and filters leading to ineffective control of virus spread","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread in built environments","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and replacement of filters, and use of HEPA filters for effective virus control","Technologies":"HEPA filters, ultraviolet radiation, air disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in high-traffic areas","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Failure to maintain pressure differentials leading to inadequate cleanliness control","Impact":"Risk of contaminated air spreading from low-cleanliness areas to high-cleanliness areas","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of pressure differentials, use of mechanical ventilation systems to maintain airflow direction","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, pressure sensors, airflow monitors","People":"Building occupants, particularly in high-risk areas such as toilets and kitchens","Owner":"Facility managers, building maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Incorrect operation of heat recovery devices leading to inadequate control of air quality","Impact":"Risk of cross-contamination between supply and return air, leading to potential virus spread","Mitigation":"Proper adjustment and balancing of air pressure, regular inspection and maintenance of heat recovery devices","Technologies":"Heat recovery devices, air pressure sensors, airflow monitors","People":"Building occupants in areas affected by air recirculation","Owner":"Facility managers, building maintenance staff"}]}
